title: LFT to learn to play with
body:
Hey guys just started playing league and love the game to bits but I'm not very good haha.

Looking for a few people that i could play with learn from and get the basics down pat with. Would eventually like to play in a serious ranked team but gotta practice I'm available most days depending what shift I'm working.

If you are interested in helping me out or starting a team let me know :).


thePlebSeb

replies.body:
I'd be willing to play some normals with you, give you some tips and have a good time.
Add me in game if you're interested.
sweet i sent you a friend request
